entries.name: new(*sets)
entries.desc: Creates a new ComposedSet containing sets.  Use Gem::Resolver.compose_sets instead.

entries.name: find_all(req)
entries.desc: Finds all specs matching req in all sets.

entries.name: prerelease=(allow_prerelease)
entries.desc: When allow_prerelease is set to true prereleases gems are allowed to match dependencies.

entries.name: remote=(remote)
entries.desc: Sets the remote network access for all composed sets.
